description:
An intimidating former B-rank adventurer who works the front desk at the Ruine adventurer`s guild. Does all kinds of different jobs, from dispensing quests to identifying items that adventurers have found on their journeys. An older-sister type who`s watched over Aria since she first came to the town. Has a lover, supposedly, but...?
Source: Official page
name: Arnold Holzweilzenegger
